Shankar chose Kapoor for the lead role in Nayak, and Kapoor called it an honor to work with Shankar. This collaboration is a significant relationship between the director and actor.

node_2: rajinikanth's real life name - shivaji rao gaekwad
edge: Shankar made the script for Mudhalvan with Rajinikanth in his mind, and Nayak's character name is Shivaji Rao Gaekwad because of this.
Shankar cast Rani Mukerji for the role of Manjari instead of Manisha Koirala, as he felt that her bubbly image was needed for the character.
In Nayak, Rani Mukerji played the role of Manjari, who became the love interest of Kapoor's character.
Rani Mukerji didn't copy what Manisha Koirala had done before in the original version of Nayak while portraying her role.
Ahmed Khan and Sushmita Sen made special appearances in Nayak.

Principal photography of Nayak was handled in more than 100 locations across several Indian states.
Thota Tharani served as the art director for Nayak.
H. Sridhar was the sound designer for Nayak.

node_1: mumbai, pune, cities in tamil nadu
edge: A 22-day schedule for shooting Nayak was held in Mumbai, Pune, and several cities in Tamil Nadu.
Nayak was edited by B. Lenin and V. T. Vijayan.
